name: GraalOnline Zone
description:
Asteroids everywhere, we need more people to defend the earth - Download now the free version of Zone and play missions, join squads and bomb your enemy in spars!

GraalOnline Zone is coming back - a massively multiplayer arcade battle game for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch!

Enter battlefields joining hundreds of other players for an unique game play experience, using dual-stick controls and powerful weapons.

GraalOnline Zone is the free version, you can also download Zone+ which gives additional customization options - more clothes and character looks to choose from, and you can build space ships!
